title: 服务器人数如果是2个或2个以上后无法繁殖生物
author: 喔米嘛嘛
txt_content:
服务器内玩家超过2名或等于2名后，便无法繁殖生物了，只会有经验球，红心显示，但没有小动物，如果服务器人数为1人则可正常繁殖，可以使用生物蛋刷出小生物，请问是什么原因。
Nerverlag插件配置已改【代码见下】
BreedingLittle插件配置已改【代码见下】
ESS未禁止生成和繁殖
均确定已经允许生物繁殖，并且区域内生物远未到禁止繁殖的程度
确定无法繁殖并非权限问题【服务器人在2个或2个以上后OP也无法给动物喂东西繁殖】
BreedingLittle插件内设置：
#Specify the breed limit for each animal per area (see "area-size" for area specifications).  
#Breed limit of 0 (zero) will cause an animal to never be bred.
#If an animal does not appear on the list, its breeding limit will not be regulated.
#Example of syntax:
#
#breed-limit: 
#- cow = 10
#- pig = 20
#- mushroomcow = 5
#- ozelot = 5
#
#Note that to add ocelot to the list, it MUST be spelled "ozelot"

breed-limit:
- cow = 1000
- pig = 2000
- chicken = 3000
- sheep = 2500

#Specify the spawn limit for villagers per area (see "area-size" for area specifications).
#Spawn limit of 0 (zero) will cause villagers to never spawn.  Villagers will not be regulated if the villager-limit field
#is left blank.
#Example of syntax:
#
#villager-limit: 10
#
#This will allow only 10 villagers to spawn within the area-size.

villager-limit: 

#Customize the message the player sees when they are unable to breed an animal.
#Example of syntax:
#该动物已被限制圈养上限!
#breeding-failed-msg: You cannot breed this animal.  Slaughter a few and try again!

breeding-failed-msg: You cannot breed this animal.  Max limit has been reached.

#Customize the size of the area that will be limited.  The size specified is the x, z, and y
#of the area around the player that will have a breeding limit enforced.
#Example of syntax:
#
#area-size: 16, 16, 256
#
#This will enforce the breed limit within each 16 wide x 16 long x 256 deep sections of land centered around the player.
#Based on the example syntax for breed-limit (cow = 10, pig = 20), this will make it so there can be up to
#10 cows and 20 pigs in each 16 x 16 x 256 chunk of land. 

area-size: 16, 16, 256
复制代码NerverLag插件配置：
#限制实体总数量
MobLimit:
  Enable: true
  #总实体数量超过设定则不再生成动物
  Animal: 500
  #总实体数量超过设定则不再生成怪物
  Monster: 300
  #区块怪物实体超过设定数量，刷怪笼不工作
  SpawnerMobChunkNum: 3
复制代码

replies.author: EnTIv
replies.txt_content:
很奇怪的问题 请告知你是什么服务端和版本号
你确定是人数的区别吗?一般插件不会按人数判断所以有可能是服务端配置文件错误?
bukkit.yml倒是有按照人数算的 你也可以加我Q 1522935501 详细说

replies.author: 喔米嘛嘛
replies.txt_content:
EnTIv 发表于 2017-12-30 19:25
很奇怪的问题 请告知你是什么服务端和版本号
你确定是人数的区别吗?一般插件不会按人数判断所以有可能是服 ...
emmm，解决了，服务器内的动物过多导致的，装了更多生物mod后mod生物太多了，改了mod配置文件让生物变少就可以正常繁殖了

replies.author: 喔米嘛嘛
replies.txt_content: 个人解决了，原因是更多生物mod里的mod生物过多导致，改了mod文件后就可以正常繁殖了
